examples.example: 当他离开家乡去追寻梦想时，心中充满了对未来的期待。

translate.english: When he left his hometown to pursue his dream, his heart was filled with expectations for the future.

examples.example: 当他决定离开舒适圈去挑战自我时，眼神中充满了坚定和勇气。

translate.english: When he decided to leave the comfort zone to challenge himself, his eyes were full of firmness and courage.

examples.example: 当他离开熟悉的环境去探索世界时，脸上洋溢着兴奋与憧憬。

translate.english: When he left the familiar environment to explore the world, his face was filled with excitement and longing.
